dc:title: On Pilgrimage - October 1947
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflection on Peter Maurin's ideas of groups of farming families on the land. Notes the work Fall brings at the farm and describes the community life of Doukhobors, Shakers, and the extinct Ephrata Community. Dismisses the efficiency offered by advertising.
